title: Beginners Crash Course
desc: Beginners Crash Course The 2nd Monday 7-9pm and the 2nd Saturday of the month 2-4pm, Check the schedule  here. Tango Crash Course for Beginners is for people who want to learn all the basics of Argentine tango in a single day. This intensive course will prepare you to dance with elegance and style at milongas (the social parties of tango). ?  ???????? No partner needed ?  ???????? No tango experience required ?  ???????? Leather soled shoes are required Program: Fundamentals, posture, embrace, feet positions, musicality, connection, ?navigation, Caja continuada, Baldosa, paso basico, decorations, the etiquette of milongas (social dancing), and basic but elegant patterns to use on the dance floor. $35 in advance, $40 at the door.   Check our website:  http://learnargentinetango.com/programs-2/beginner-program/ beginners-crash-courses Register here: http://learnargentinetango.com/programs-2/beginner-program/beginners-crash-courses
